lines.speaker: COUNT RUGEN
lines.line: You must be that Spanish brat I taught a lesson to all those years ago. It’s simply incredible. Have you been chasing me your whole life only to lose now? I think that’s the worst thing I ever heard. How marvelous.

lines.speaker: COUNT RUGEN
lines.line: Good heavens, are you still trying to win?

lines.speaker: COUNT RUGEN
lines.line: You’ve got an overdeveloped sense of vengeance. It’s going to et you in trouble someday.

lines.speaker: INIGO
lines.line: Hello. My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father; prepare to die.

lines.speaker: INIGO
lines.line: Hello. My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father; prepare to die.

lines.speaker: INIGO
lines.line: Hello. My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father; prepare to die!

lines.speaker: COUNT RUGEN
lines.line: All that I have and more. Please!

lines.speaker: INIGO
lines.line: Offer me everything I ask for!

lines.speaker: INIGO
lines.line: I want my father back you son of a bitch!
